name: Variable names are BPELVariableNames, that is, NCNames (as defined in XML Schema specification) but in addition they MUST NOT contain the “.” character.
description: Variable names are BPELVariableNames, that is, NCNames (as defined in XML Schema specification) but in addition they MUST NOT contain the “.” character.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: Compatible with CISQ 18 and especially ASCCSM-CWE-835
remediation: Variable names are BPELVariableNames, that is, NCNames (as defined in XML Schema specification) but in addition they MUST NOT contain the “.” character.
